greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decrement each nonzero digit by one in primorial base representation of n, then convert back to decimal.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..30030
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: (PARI) A328842(n) = { my(p=2, r=1, s=0); while(n, if((n%p)>0, s += ((n%p)-1)*r); r *= p; n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 30 2019
